Denotes the duration it takes for the sy: ʻOku ne fakahaaʻi ʻa e loloa ʻo e taimi ʻoku fie maʻu ki he polokalama ke hiki ki ha liliu mahuʻinga. ʻOku fie maʻu ha taimi lahi ange ki he fakatonuʻi ʻi he fanga kiʻi kaka iiki ange ka ʻoku nau fakahehema ke ʻomi ha tuʻuaki ʻoku maʻolunga ange.

It's advisable to align it with the avai: ʻOku fie maʻu ke fenapasi ia mo e VRAM ʻoku lava ke maʻu ʻi hoʻo GPU. ʻOku ʻomi ʻe he fokotuʻutuʻu ʻo e 4 ha ngaahi meʻa ʻoku tonu kae mamalie ange ʻa e ngaue, ka ʻoku ʻomi ʻe he 8 ha ngaahi ola vave mo angamaheni.

Enabling this setting will result in the: ʻE iku ʻa e fokotuʻutuʻu ko ʻeni ki he ngaahi faile ʻa e G mo e d ʻo fakahaofi pe ʻenau ngaahi polokalama fakamuimuitaha, ʻa ia ʻoku ola lelei conserving feituʻu tauhiʻanga ʻo e meʻakai.
This setting enables you to save the wei: ʻOku hanga ʻe he tukunga ko ʻeni ʻo ʻai ke ke lava ʻo fakahaofi ʻa e mamafa ʻo e sipinga ʻi he fakaʻosinga ʻo e ʻepoki foʻou takitaha.

Sets advanced GPU settings, recommended: Fokotuʻu ha ngaahi feituʻu GPU fakalakalaka, ʻoku fokotuʻu atu ki he kau fakaʻaongaʻi ʻoku lelei ange GPU fale.
Specify the number of GPUs you wish to u: Fakamahinoʻi ʻa e lahi ʻo e GPUs ʻoku ke fie fakaʻaongaʻi ki hono toʻo ʻaki haʻo fakahu kinautolu ʻe he haifine (-).
The number of CPU cores to use in the pr: Ko e lahi ʻo e CPU cores ke fakaʻaongaʻi ʻi he ngaue kimuʻa. Ko e feituʻu ne ʻuluaki seti ko hoʻo cores, ʻa ia ʻoku fokotuʻu atu ki he ngaahi meʻa lahi.
Specify the number of GPUs you wish to u: Fakamahinoʻi ʻa e lahi ʻo e GPUs ʻoku ke fie fakaʻaongaʻi ki he ngaue kimuʻa ʻaki haʻo fakahu kinautolu ʻaki haifine (-). ʻI he taimi ko ia, he ʻikai ʻi ai ha ola mahuʻinga ʻo hono fakaʻaongaʻi ʻo e gpu fakavahaʻa-taʻu.
Fakamalohiʻi hono fakaʻaongaʻi ʻo e CPU ki he ako.
The number of CPU cores to use in the ex: Lahi ʻo e CPU cores ke fakaʻaongaʻi ʻi he founga toʻo ʻulí. Ko e feituʻu ne ʻuluaki seti ko hoʻo cores, ʻa ia ʻoku fokotuʻu atu ki he ngaahi meʻa lahi.
Utilize pretrained models when training: Fakaʻaongaʻi e kau tā sīpinga kuo ʻosi akoʻí ʻi he taimi ʻoku akoʻi ai koé. ʻOku hanga ʻe he founga ko ʻení ʻo fakasiʻisiʻi ʻa e lōloa ʻo e taimi akó mo fakalahi ʻa e tuʻunga
We prioritize running the model extracti: ʻOku tau fakamuʻomuʻa hono fakalele ʻo e sipinga toʻo ʻuli ʻi he GPU ke vave ange ʻa e ngaue. Kapau ʻoku ke fie fakaʻaongaʻi ʻa e CPU, mavahe pe mei he feituʻu GPU.
We prioritize running the model preproce: ʻOku tau fakamuʻomuʻa ʻa e sipinga ʻo e ngaue ʻi he GPU ke vave ange ʻa e ngaue. Kapau ʻoku ke fie fakaʻaongaʻi ʻa e CPU, mavahe pe mei he feituʻu GPU.
Cache the dataset in GPU memory to speed: Cache ʻa e dataset ʻi GPU manatu ke vave ʻa e founga ako.
KMeans is a clustering algorithm that di: Ko e KMeans ko ha clustering algorithm ʻoku ne vahevahe ʻa e dataset ki he K. ʻOku matuʻaki ʻaonga ʻa e ʻatakai ko ʻeni ki he datasets lalahi.
By employing pitch guidance, it becomes: ʻI hono fakaʻaongaʻi ʻo e fakahinohino, ʻe lava ke ne faʻifaʻitaki ʻa e intonation ʻo e leʻo totonu, kau ai hono tuʻuaki. ʻOku matuʻaki mahuʻinga ʻa e konga ko ʻeni ki he hiva mo e ngaahi tukunga kehe ʻoku mahuʻinga ai hono fakatolonga ʻo e fasi totonu pe sipinga ʻo e tuʻuaki.
Detect overtraining to prevent the model: ʻIloʻi ʻa e ako ke taʻofi ʻa e sipinga mei hono ako lelei ʻo e fakamatala ako pea mole ʻa e malava ke generalize ki he fakamatala foʻou.

Exported Pth file: Faile ʻo e Pth naʻe hiki atú

Clean your audio output using noise dete: Fakamaʻa hoʻo ongo Output ʻo fakaʻaongaʻi ʻa e fakatokanga ki he longoaʻa algorithms, ʻa ia ʻoku fokotuʻu atu ki he lea audios.

Set the pitch of the audio, the higher t: Fokotuʻu ʻa e tuʻuaki ʻo e ongo, ko e maʻolunga ange ia ʻa e mahuʻinga, ko e maʻolunga ange ia ʻa e tuʻuaki.
Pitch extraction algorithm to use for th: Fokotuʻu ʻa e algorithm toʻo ʻuli ke fakaʻaongaʻi ki he ului ʻo e ongo. Ko e algorithm default ko e rmvpe, ʻa ia ʻoku fokotuʻu atu ki ha ngaahi meʻa lahi.

If the number is greater than or equal t: Kapau ʻoku lahi ange ʻa e fika ʻi he toko tolu, ʻoku lava ke fakasiʻisiʻi ʻa e fakamanava ʻi hono siviʻi ʻo e kaa loto hala ʻi he ngaahi ola ʻo e tanaki.

Safeguard distinct consonants and breath: Maluʻi ʻa e consonants mo e manava ke taʻofi ʻa e electro mo e ngaahi koloa kehe. ʻOku ʻomi ʻe hono fusi ʻo e Parameter ki hono mahuʻinga lahi taha ʻo e 0.5 ha maluʻi fakaʻauliliki. Neongo ia, ʻe hanga ʻe hono fakasiʻisiʻi ʻo e tuʻunga ʻulungaanga mahuʻinga ko ʻeni ʻo fakasiʻisiʻi ʻa e lahi ʻo e maluʻi lolotonga ʻene mitigating ʻa e ola ʻo e fakahokohoko fakamotuʻalea.

Fokotuʻu ʻa e compressor Release MS.

Fokotuʻu ʻa e ngaahi sekoni ʻo e fakatoloi.
Fokotuʻu ʻa e fakamatala ki he fakatoloi.
Fakaʻaongaʻi ʻa e fakatoloi ki he ongo.
Move files to custom embedder folder: Hiki ʻa e ngaahi faile ki he fouluta embedder angamaheni
Name of the model creator. (Default: Unk: Hingoa ʻo e tokotaha fakatupu sipinga. (Peesi tuʻumaʻu: ʻikai ʻiloʻi)
Model Author Name: Hingoa ʻo e tokotaha faʻu tohi
The name that will appear in the model i: Ko e hingoa ʻe ʻasi ʻi he fakamatala ʻo e motolo.
Select the speaker ID to use for the con: Fili ʻa e ID lea ke fakaʻaongaʻi ki he fakaului.
Set the autotune strength - the more you: Fokotuʻu ʻa e malohi autotune-ko e lahi ange ia hoʻo fakalahi ia ko e lahi ange ia ʻene ʻalu ki he grid chromatic.
